page.title: 16CLUBS,RECREAT'S,ARTS,CRAFTS
page.content: USK AREA LEISURE ACTIVITIES. The Communnity Centre offers facilities for various activities including Usk Community Playgroup, Mother and Toddlers Group, Usk Young Farmers' Club, Usk Band, Usk Christian Fellowship, and Clubs for Girls' Netball, Yoga, Badminton, Martial Art Classes (7-16) and for Youth Club, Karate, children's Disco Dancing club and Short Tennis. The Usk Town Football Club plays Soccer Football on "The Island", which has a picnic area, and is part of the Usk Valley Walk. Licensed Salmon and Trout fishing takes place in the River Usk. There is a caravan site at the college used by Caravan Clubs for rallies, and a 5 caravan site at Panty-Colin Farm, used by touring caravans. During the college vacations painting schools are held, using students' facilities
